doc.name: ContainmentExtender
doc.description: An implementation of containment extender for modal models as an attribute. This attribute defines a special containment relationship that is slightly different from the containment relationship defined by getContainer(). The getExtendedContainer() method returns the container of the object that contains the implementing attribute. The returned container is supposed to be the object that visually contains the object that owns the implementing attribute, as seen by the model designer. In particular, for a modal model (either FSM or Ptera), even though a refinement is visually contained by a state or an event, getContainer() of that refinement does not return the state or event because of a difference between the visual representation and internal data representation. In that case, getExtendedContainer() of this class returns the state or event.
